Text: REpst I did not know about you and Kate Congradlutions My family is fine and Im happy to see your about to start one of your own You probably heard this once or twice in the last month but its really only a job Keep your head up and if there is anything that comes to mind that I might be able to help you with The number is or home Good Luck Original Message From Motley Matt mailtoMatt NRONcom Sent Tuesday November PM To Abrahams Harvey Subject RE Harvey Thanks for the note I really appreciate your concern I hope all is well in the European markets and you and your family are settling in your new enviroment Things are crazy here You would not believe the situation with ENEs credit situation Nothing we could have ever expected Things are fine with me though Kate my fianceIm not sure if you knew is coming back to Portland and we are to spend some time in December together Tkae care and thanks again Regards Matt Original Message From Abrahams Harvey mailto atSourceTullettEuropecom Sent Tuesday November AM To Subject During these trying times I wanted to let you know that I hope your doing as well as can be expected If there is anything I can do for you let me know Harvey This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
